title: Michigan Wolverines and Washington Huskies each playing for first title in College Football Playoff era
description: Follow the latest news and live updates as the Michigan Wolverines take on the Washington Huskies in the NCAA College Football Playoff Championship in Houston, Texas.

title: Nintendo is expected to launch the 'Switch 2' console this year. Here's what to expect.
description: Nintendo is likely to release a new Switch console this year, analysts told CNBC, as the Japanese gaming giant looks to capitalize on the interest in its characters ranging from Mario to Zelda.

title: Judges in England and Wales are given cautious approval to use AI in writing legal opinions
description: England’s 1,000-year-old legal system has taken a cautious step into the future by giving judges permission to use artificial intelligence to help produce rulings.

title: House Republicans release report recommending Hunter Biden be held in contempt of Congress
description: House Republicans on the Judiciary and Oversight on Monday released their report recommending that the president's son Hunter Biden be held in contempt of Congress for defying a subpoena to appear for a closed-door transcribed interview as part of their impeachment inquiry into President Joe Biden.

title: Mary Lou Retton says she faced 'death in the eyes' while in ICU
description: Legendary Olympic gymnast Mary Lou Retton speaks exclusively to TODAY’s Hoda Kotb about the fight for her life with a rare form of pneumonia that landed her in the ICU for a month and the outpouring support from her fans. “I have so much to look forward to. I’m a fighter.”

title: Missing door plug that detached from Alaska Airlines plane found in Oregon backyard
description: A missing door plug that could be key to the investigation into what caused it to detach from a plane midflight Friday has been found in the backyard of a Portland, Oregon-area resident, officials said Sunday.

title: Iowa school shooter appeared to be active on Discord and discussed ‘gearing up’ in hours before attack
description: The Iowa gunman, Dylan Butler, who opened fire on Perry High School last week appeared to have an active account on the internet chat platform Discord.
